attributes.action: Provide additional time of 1 year to those who have passed driving theory tests
attributes.additional_details: Allowing learning driving students with additional time will result in equal opportunities for everyone. It makes things fair because due to what has happened because of covid average people are losing money on many things as well as driving so I feel that it would be ideal in this great country that we live in to have this opportunity.
attributes.background: I would like for the government to give additional time of one year to those who have passed thier driving theory tests due to learners not being able to book a test and given the opportunity as it would normally have been given to any citizen of england.
